attributes.action: Make Royals Pay the £369 million for their Palace Renovations, not the taxpayers
attributes.additional_details:
If the public are forced to pay, when will it end? Next up will be the crumbling, asbestos-infested palace of Westminster with repairs in excess of £3bn.

https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2015/jun/18/palace-of-westminster-renovation-options-report

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_British_royal_residences

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2015/jul/02/queen-buckingham-palace-public-150m-repair-bill
attributes.background:
This is a time of financial & economic hardship with an uncertain future.The NHS is collapsing, housing & schooling in crisis & austerity forcing constant funding cuts in front line services.

The Royals have Windsor Castle, Balmoral Castle, Sandringham House etc. Sell one to fund the repairs.
